Thank you for buying WeaveDroid via Google Play and thus supporting the project. Unfortunately, there are two issues with Google Play:

1. Accounts may be gone after a reboot

You may encounter the problem that all your WeaveDroid accounts (including contacts and events) are gone after rebooting your device. The reason is a bug in Android that causes accounts of paid apps to be removed on start-up because the (encrypted) APK files are loaded after checking for orphaned accounts.

Affected users:
* all Android 4.1 users who have got WeaveDroid from Play Store;
* Android 4.2 users who have got WeaveDroid from Play Store only with certain devices (for instance, most Samsung devices)

2. Accounts may be gone after upgrading WeaveDroid

You may encounter the problem that all your WeaveDroid accounts (including contacts and events) when Play Store updates WeaveDroid. The reason is another bug in Android that causes accounts of paid apps to be removed when upgrading for a similar reason.

Affected users: some Android 4.4.2 users who have got WeaveDroid from Play Store (known for Nexus devices and Moto G)

If you\'re affected by one of these bugs, please install the WeaveDroid JB Workaround.

Welcome to WeaveDroid/%s!

WeaveDroid is an Android 4+ sync adapter for CalDAV/CardDAV. To use it, just add a WeaveDroid account for your CalDAV/CardDAV server and your contacts/events will be synchronized in both directions.

For more information, please see the WeaveDroid homepage. There\'s a Setup guide, too. WeaveDroid respects your privacy, see our Privacy Policy.

If you use CyanogenMod, "Privacy Guard" must be disabled for WeaveDroid. Otherwise, WeaveDroid is not allowed to access and synchronize your contacts and events.

In case of problems, please read the FAQ first. If you encounter a bug that is clearly related to WeaveDroid, enter it on Github issues instead of contacting us directly or giving a poor rating for the app.

Open-source

WeaveDroid is designed to be an open-source project from the very first beginning. It is always possible to compile the app yourself and use it for free without any obligations. The source code is available on Github, and you can download the app on F-droid.

However, it was much work to create this app, so we have decided to put it into the commercial stores for a small fee. If you want to support this project, please consider donating to WeaveDroid or purchasing it.
